me_description: I am a full-stack developer from Quebec, Canada, aiming to make positive change in the world. When I'm not coding, I enjoy watching stand-up or horror series, or spending some quality time with my girlfriend. I develop web applications with
contact_title: Need a website or an application built?
contact_subtitle: Let's bring your idea to life.
name: NAME
rmr_description: This is a website for the local Montreal non-profit Rosetta's Angels. It is a Ruby on Rails application using the Stimulus framework. This non-profit helps underpriviledged families during the holidays. More than 10 000$ were raised in the first month after the launch of the website.
cf_description: This is a website facilitating the process of finding trustworthy Canadian charities. It is a React application communicating with a REST API I developed. Unfortunately, not all charities use their donations wisely and I believe people deserve to know where their money is going.
dbh_description: This website allows you to browse through various dog breeds and learn about their distinctive traits. Hopefully, it'll make it easier for people to find the ideal furry companion. It is a React application written in Typescript that communicates with API Ninjas' dog API.
surl_description: This is a website that allows you to create shortened URLs. It is a Ruby on Rails application styled with TailwindCSS.
it_description: This web application allows you to track your project bugs efficiently. It is a Next.js app written in TypeScript and using the React and Radix UI libraries.
